jobDescription: Prudential Financial is looking for an enthusiastic Director of Data Science to help build out a centralized advanced data analytics capability as an enterprise service. The role requires a rare combination of deep and sophisticated analytical expertise; business acumen; a strategic and technical mindset; and client, relationship and project management proficiency, together with a passion for building new capabilities and teams. This is an exciting opportunity to drive customer-centric thinking in a new and growing organization. The Customer Office team merges the entrepreneurial spirit of a start-up with the stability of one of the world’s most established financial services companies. We operate in a fast-paced environment and are looking for someone who takes the initiative and is excited about being part of a cultural and business transformation. Experimentation and innovation are encouraged.  Responsibilities for this position include building the framework, sourcing, leading and presenting forward-thinking, high-impact Data Science projects  focused on key strategic initiatives. You will lead a team in an exciting and engaging environment, using your skills and experience to make key  contributions to our business, push your creative boundaries, socialize new ideas and, most importantly, have fun.
